summary: Implements the convolutional component of a Conformer block for wav2vec 2.0 models, applying a sequence of convolutional operations to transform input audio features and capture local context before they are processed by subsequent attention layers.
business_intent: Provide a reusable, efficient convolutional layer that enriches speech representations within the Conformer architecture of wav2vec 2.0, improving local pattern modeling for downstream speech tasks.
